folder: Smith Street & Schermerhorn Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Smith Street, at the S.E. corner of Schermerhorn Street, showing Shields Hall formerly known as the Saenger Bund Hall, demolished in or before 1929.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

folder: Schermerhorn Street & Smith Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
(1) Schermerhorn Street, north side, across subway excavation, east from Smith Street, showing the Abraham & Straus Building.

April 13, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same, showing also Smith Street, and taken from site for Central Courts Building, at the S.W. corner of Smith and Schermerhorn Streets.

October 5, 1929.

P. L. Sperr.

folder: Schermerhorn Street & Smith Street, Brooklyn, NY

folder: Schermerhorn Street & Smith Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
(1) Schermerhorn Street, east from Smith Street, across excavation for Eighth Ave., Subway of the Independent Lines.

June 1, 1929.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same, almost three years later, showing excavation filled in.

April 7, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.

title: Brooklyn - 112 Schermerhorn Street - Boerum Place - Smith Street
